meanings.definition: A family of freshwater fish including carp and minnows.
meanings.sent1: Cyprinids like carp and minnows are commonly found in rivers and lakes.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of cyprinids swimming gracefully in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The cyprinids decided to have a family reunion in the stream.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering cyprinids in the water looked like jewels.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the colorful cyprinids darting around.

meanings.definition: Any fish belonging to the family Cyprinidae.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium displayed various cyprinids from the Cyprinidae family.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often catch cyprinids while fishing in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the cyprinids swimming in the tank.
meanings.sent4: The cyprinids in the pond seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The biologist studied the behavior of cyprinids in their natural habitat.
